title: Wendy Williams takes her son to a strip club, teaches him how to make it rain
text:
Kevin asked his mum to bring him to a strip club (Picture: Michael Tran/FilmMagic)

Wendy Williams isn’t a regular mom, she’s a cool mom.

The TV star went full Mrs George from Mean Girls as she took her son to a strip club for some bonding time.

Wendy, 55, was asked by her 19-year-old son Kevin to accompany him to a strip club, and while she initially wasn’t down for the odd mother-son date, she changed her mind.

Speaking on The Wendy Williams Show, she said: ‘First of all, I didn’t think anything of this was going to be happening, Second of all, I think a guy is supposed to go with their father if they wanna go to a strip club.

‘He asked me, like, three months ago, “Mom, take me to a strip club”. Are you outta your mind?’

She joked that someone would call child protection services or the cops on her: ‘But, when we were out in L.A., somehow the spirit hit me …’

Wendy brought Kevin and her nephew along to a Los Angeles strip club, where she claims some of the strippers asked not to be judged.

She said: ‘”I got two kids, I’m in nursing school, and I’m only doing this… Miss Wendy, please don’t judge me.” I’m like, “I’m not judging you, can you move over to my son?”‘

However, Wendy was not impressed with her son and nephew’s methods of simply flopping their one dollar bills on the stage.

Wendy was not impressed that her son and nephew couldn’t make it rain (Picture: Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic)

The star – who split from Kevin’s father Kevin Hunter earlier this year – said: ‘I’m like, “What’s wrong with you two? You gotta make it rain!”‘

She isn’t wrong.

Wendy recently praised her son as she received her star on the Hollywood Walk Of Fame.

A tearful Wendy said: ‘My son is here with me … he’s only 19, he’s only known me as Mom with the microphone, and then Mom in the headlines, and Mom saying out-of-order stuff.

‘So, this star means everything. Because now he’s got something to look at and say, “My mom did it”.’

It’s been a tough year for the Williams family, with Wendy dumping her husband after he allegedly welcomed a baby with her mistress.

Wendy had been living in a sober house to tackle addiction issues, while Kevin Jnr was arrested after getting into a physical altercation with his dad.
